lender.name: Christian M. Zummer
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels not to have any funds to start a business or operation that you're really passionate about. Now that I have the means to gather that income to start my dreams, I want to give others that feel like I did a chance to start their dreams up.
lender.occupational_info:
If you're familiar with a greenhouse, that's the best explanation.
My first job involves working in a retail store selling plants to people wishing to start a garden or to make their landscape more beautiful.
My second job involves taking care of the landscapes where I go to school. There is lots of planting, lots of cleaning, and lots of hard work involved.

lender.name: Ksenia
lender.loan_because: Hello! My name is Ksenia. I am from Tallinn. I am 24 y.o. I was born in Estonia, but I lived in Germany, Russia, Norway. So cause of this I speak 4 languages. I am very talented young women. I am learnin at the university. And how it usually happen, came time to be indipendent, to survay, to feed my mother. I am starting business, my own.. uff... It is so interestig. I have plan to make business with China, to bring productio in Estonia first after in Russia and Belarus. I want to give working places for people in Tallinn, who are really need it, save envoriment (cause production will BIO), help people to save their health. It is very short about my mission... If you are interested pls write me and I will answer you to all question. For my small business I need and kindly ask you to borrow me 5000$. You help me today and I will help you tomorrow! Please give me a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Wholesale BIO productions- food... biofireplaces etc.

lender.occupational_info: I am co-owner of a small company, we design and manufacture wallpaper products which are sold worldwide.

I was fortunate to have enough when I was growing up so when I moved to the United States I vowed to help others rise out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a registered nurse in a community hospital. I work in Progressive Care Unit (a stepdown of ICU). I'm also currently pursuing my Masters in Business Administration and would like to own my own nursing recruitment agency someday.

lender.occupational_info:
BYC is a large group of individuals and corporate entities making money in various premium businesses such as Diamond Holiday led by our illustrious leader, Faith Sloan. As we make money, we lend more money and provide blessings to those in the Kiva community.
Faith Sloan makes the loans from the contributions donated by the Build Your Channel network from our Diamond Holiday Travel earnings.
